entities.name: minister for magic
entities.description: The Minister for Magic is a government official who is being abused by Harry and his friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who thinks the Ministry has no right to ask him for help.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's who shares Hermione's opinion about the Ministry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has been put through a lot by the Ministry in the previous year.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is a government agency that offers Apparition Lessons to students.

relationships.description: Harry has been abused by the Ministry in the previous year.
Hermione disapproves of the Ministry asking Harry for help now.
Ron also disapproves of the Ministry asking Harry for help now.
Harry is eligible to take Apparition Lessons from the Ministry.
